Mastering JavaScript

JavaScript powers the web - it's **the** most important programming language you need to know as a web developer. For example, you should understand code like this: ```js const basics = 'Okay, that should not be too difficult actually'; function printBasics() { console.log(basics): } printBasics(); ``` Learn more about it [here](https://academind.com).
